about_the_game:
Shadow Spell Saga: The Winds of Fate is an original entry in the SRPG genre. Challenge yourself with tactical, turn-based gameplay, as you move your team of unique characters around the map to defeat the enemy army. Build your army from dozens of playable characters, equip your soldiers with a vast arsenal of weapons and gear, and level up your heroes in this strategy-heavy, story-driven RPG.

Conquer 26 grid-based maps with formidable enemies, extensive dialogue and dozens of secrets to find. A large roster of characters, unlockable lore entries, and alternate map versions provide replay value; not everyone will join your team the first time through, and everyone has stories to tell!

Experience a sweeping narrative of destiny and determination as a web of betrayal, rivalry, and intrigue threatens to tear the Empire apart. Explore a compelling new fantasy world enriched by dynamic characters and dozens of optional dialogues to discover. And challenge your tactical abilities as armies clash with the fate of the continent at stake!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista(sp2) / 7 / 8 / 10 (32 bit/64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processer
  • Memory: 806 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 806 MB available space

short_description: A tactical RPG set in an original fantasy world. Driven by story, characters, and nostalgic strategy gameplay. 26 chapters, 40+ playable characters, and dozens of secrets to discover.
